import styles from './login.module.css' import loginJson from '../JSON/login.json' import imageStorage from '../assets/Login/imageStorage' import { useRef } from 'react' import { useEffect } from 'react' const loginFormJson = loginJson.form const Login = (props) => { const submitRef = useRef('') useEffect(() => { console.log(submitRef); }, []) return (

{loginJson.greeting}

{loginJson.header}

{loginJson.desc}
{/*
{loginJson.button}
*/}

{loginFormJson.title}

{loginFormJson.span_1}
) } export default Login
